name: Moving Out (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description: A multiple level puzzle game where the player interacts and moves boxes to get to

the next level.

Lore: You are a construction worker that wakes up in an abandoned factory, so you figure that

the best idea for now is to try to get out of there.

Instructions:

R to reset

G to grab the box

Wasd or arrow keys to move and space to jump

The goal is to get to the red flag on the other side of the map.

Buttons can be interacted with through boxes.

There are 6 levels and an end screen.
